translations.text: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,<sup foot_note=197804>1</sup>
And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.<sup foot_note=197805>1</sup>
Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
He will be in a pleasant life.
But as for one whose scales are light,
His refuge<sup foot_note=197806>1</sup> will be an abyss.<sup foot_note=197807>2</sup>
And what can make you know what that is?
It is a Fire, intensely hot.
